roleset.name: develop sexual characteristics (usually masculine)

example.name: arg 1
example.text: the virilization of the male subject

roleset.note: it may* be possible to have an arg 0 here. I searched and couldn't find any examples. None have come up so far, but it should be added if necessary.

predicate.note: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.
